sources.title: King.And. Country.
sources.description: King and Country is a 1964 British war film directed by Joseph Losey, shot in black and white, and starring Dirk Bogarde and Tom Courtenay. Set during World War I, focusing on Private Arthur Hamp, who is accused of desertion after wandering away from the front lines. Captain Hargreaves defends him, but despite evidence of his mental distress, Hamp is sentenced to death by firing squad, highlighting the harsh realities of military justice and the impact of class on decision-making.
